title: ShadCN UI Components
description: Create Button, Card, Input, and Label components in apps/web/src/components/ui/ following standard ShadCN patterns. Button uses class-variance-authority for variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) and sizes (default, sm, lg, icon). Card exports Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardDescription, CardContent, CardFooter as simple div/heading wrappers. Input is a styled HTML input. Label is a styled native label element (no Radix dependency). All use the existing cn() utility from ~/lib/utils. Remove the .gitkeep placeholder file.
